title: How to Draw a Water Bottle

steps.title: Draw out the top of the bottle cap.
steps.content: Draw out the top of the bottle cap.

steps.title: Draw the rest of the bottle cap's top.
steps.content: Draw the rest of the bottle cap's top.

steps.title: Draw the midsection of the bottle cap.
steps.content: Draw the midsection of the bottle cap.

steps.title: Draw the base of the bottle cap.
steps.content: Draw the base of the bottle cap. This the part that twists off from the bottle.

steps.title: Draw the fine lines that are usually at the top of the cap.
steps.content: Draw the fine lines that are usually at the top of the cap. Now, we will be moving on to drawing the bottle itself.

steps.title: Draw the upper half part of the bottle where the cap and the bottle meet.
steps.content: Draw the upper half part of the bottle where the cap and the bottle meet.

steps.title: Draw the body of the bottle.
steps.content: Draw the body of the bottle. These can come in many different shapes but for now, you may use the example image as your reference.

steps.title: Have your basic bottle shape completed.
steps.content: Have your basic bottle shape completed.

steps.title: Add some detail.
steps.content: Add some detail. Draw your bottle in a way that it will appear to be see-through.

steps.title: And that is all!
steps.content: And that is all! Color in your bottle with the medium of your choice.
